extension.summary: Mission Control allows you to make XBMC the nerve center of your living room, conference room, or other space.
extension.description: Mission Control allows you to control external devices such as televisions, projectors, A/V switches and receivers, and other digital devices via serial, web, or CEC control. This control can be achieved using Mission controls built-in Python interface inside XBMC or with a web interface using XBMC's JSON-RPC API.
extension.disclaimer: If you use this improperly, there's a strong chance Santa Claus will bring you nothing but coal until the end of time. Choose wisely. No kittens were harmed in the making of this addon.
